interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ombre Burgundy Prelooped Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Prelooped Crochet Braids 18 Inch
Review Date: 2020/09/14
Store: UHair
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UHair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 9.41 x 3.19 inches; 2.09 Pounds'}
Review Text: I love this hair! It's GORGEOUS!!!  The color is perfect.  I love that these look neat and uniform.  The ends are curled to perfection.  There is definitely enough hair included to complete your full head without too many gaps.  The orange thing included looks more like a wrist band than a hair tie, but use it as you see fit.  This hair is phenomenal.  I highly recommend.
Review Title: LOVE!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mtmei hair 5Packs 10" Pre-twisted Spring Twist Hair Crochet Braids 15 Strands/Pack Nubian Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Messy Fluffy Spring Twist Crochet Hair Extensions(T27)
Mtmei hair
{'Brand': 'Mtmei hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '10 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '9.02 x 7.52 x 2.76 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '765470972508'}
There are pros and cons to this hair.  This hair is very soft and very stretchy, so it can be pulled back out of your face. I love that this came with a crochet hook.  The T27 color is pretty BUT it is very frizzy, especially on the blonde ends.  It came straight out of the package frizzy, so I was very disappointed.  It looks like hair that has been in someone's hair for 2-3 weeks before I received it.  it's possible to make the 5 packs work, but I would've preferred to have 6 packs of hair included to make sure there weren't too many gaps without any colored hair, especially since my natural hair color is dark brown.  Overall the hair is just OK.  Next time I'll go for hair that is a better quality.
It's OK
zelaxy Mask Strap Extenders, Soft Silicone Mask Holders for Relieve Ear Pain Caused by Mask (Dot)
zelaxy
{'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.7 x 0.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'zelaxy'}
These Mask Strap Extenders are so comfortable! They're soft and it's easy to forget you have them on.  I love how they help keep my masks that are too large in place and snug where they need to be.  I love that there's no pressure on my ears whatsoever! These are phenomenal.  I highly recommend!
Comfortable and Necessary

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Engages with hair extensions, particularly pre-twisted and crochet styles. Recently purchased ombre hair, reflecting a continued interest in vibrant colors and trendy styles while maintaining a focus on beauty and aesthetics.
- **Quality Sensitivity:** Demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality materials, with recent feedback highlighting satisfaction with uniformity and curl perfection, indicating an appreciation for well-made products. Continues to prioritize durability alongside visual appeal.
- **Color Consideration:** Values specific shades that complement natural hair color. A recent purchase validated this with successful color matching, reinforcing the desire for aesthetic harmony.
- **Packaging Expectations:** Expects a sufficient quantity in packs for full coverage, as shown by the satisfaction with the recent purchase, which provided enough product to avoid gaps.
- **Practicality with Tools:** Appreciates practical inclusions for ease of use, although the varying utility of included accessories may be noted. Still values comfort and convenience, with an eye on new accessories that enhance the experience.
- **Comfort and Functionality:** Ongoing focus on products that enhance comfort and practical use reflects a well-rounded approach to selections, balancing aesthetic and functional needs.
- **Overall Attitude:** Exhibits a positive outlook towards product experiences that align with preferences for quality, color compatibility, and usability, while remaining discerning in future purchases to ensure continued satisfaction.
